title: Ex-diamond 1 OCE streamer :)
body:
Hey guys, I've been streaming on and off for the past few months and I stream solo queue. I was Diamond 1 last season and am currently mid-plat. I'm more than happy to answer questions and I talk about my decision making while playing. Would really appreciate if yall checked out my stream and would really appreciate a follow if you enjoyed.. thanks alot :)

Will be live just after ranked opens today if anyone wants to tune in :)

www.twitch.tv/global_lol

replies.body: Were you bosted to Diamond? See as you cant get back there now?
